title: Stat
description: Statistical data display with large numbers, labels, icons, and trend indicators

metadata.description: Displays statistical data with prominent numbers, descriptive labels, optional icons, and trend indicators. Commonly used in hero sections, feature areas, and dashboards to showcase metrics, KPIs, and social proof.

accessibility.notes: Numbers should use tabular-nums for alignment. Icons marked as decorative. Trend colors meet WCAG AA contrast ratios.

responsive.notes: Stat groups reflow from horizontal to vertical on mobile. Font sizes scale proportionally.

performance.notes: Lightweight component with optional count-up animation support

usageExamples.title: Stat with Icon and Trend
usageExamples.code: {{ stat({ value: '99.9', suffix: '%', label: 'Uptime', icon: 'shield', trend: { direction: 'up', value: '0.2%', label: 'vs last month' } }) }}

usageExamples.title: Featured Card Stat
usageExamples.code: {{ stat({ value: '2.4M', prefix: '$', label: 'Annual Revenue', variant: 'card featured', size: 'lg' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Horizontal Stat Group
usageExamples.description: Multiple stats in a row (hero pattern)
usageExamples.code: {{ stat({ value: '10K+', label: 'Users' }) }}{{ stat({ value: '99.9%', label: 'Uptime' }) }}{{ stat({ value: '24/7', label: 'Support' }) }}

marketingPatterns.name: Hero Stats
marketingPatterns.description: 3-4 stats in horizontal row showcasing key metrics

marketingPatterns.name: Count-Up Animation
marketingPatterns.description: Numbers animate from 0 to value on scroll for engagement
marketingPatterns.example: Linear: Growth metrics with smooth count-up

marketingPatterns.name: Trend Indicators
marketingPatterns.description: Show growth with up/down arrows and percentages
marketingPatterns.example: SaaS dashboards showing MoM or YoY growth

marketingPatterns.name: Comparison Context
marketingPatterns.example: '2x faster than competitors' or '50% lower cost'

label.description: Label describing what the statistic represents

prefix.description: Prefix symbol displayed before the value

suffix.description: Suffix text displayed after the value

icon.description: Icon name to display above the value for visual interest

trend.description: Trend indicator showing change over time

direction.description: Direction of the trend (affects color and icon)

variant.description: Style variant (can be space-separated for multiple variants)

size.description: Size of the stat (affects number, label, and icon size)

color.description: Color variant for the number value

countUp.description: Enable count-up animation (adds data-count-to attribute for JavaScript)

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this component
